EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Tasktop - EMEA / US - 2015.09.01.Email - Follow Up - No Show - Tasktop
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at Leveraging the Power of Tosca Connect and Tasktop Sync
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Leveraging the Power of Tosca Connect and Tasktop Sync
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Sorry we missed you at our recent webinar, Leveraging the Power of Tosca Connect and Tasktop Sync! In the webinar, Jeff Downs of Tasktop and Gernot Brandl of Tricentis shared how Tosca Connect, powered by Tasktop Sync, removes the barriers to test automation and enables Tosca Testsuite to be seamlessly integrated into your software development.
If you would like to see what you missed, a recording of our webinar is available here <http://www.tricentis.com/thank-you-page-tosca-connect-and-tasktop-sync-emeaus-2015-09-01/>.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>. Best regards,
The Tricentis Webinar Team
Gernot Brandl
Product Manager
Tricentis
Jeff Downs
Tasktop
